edu.cmu.iot

Class IoTControlManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.iot.IoTControlManager

  • public class IoTControlManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the state of the IoT house. This class manages house state; it is the focal point for changing settings adding users, and ensuring that the house remains in a consistent state Project: LG Exec Ed Program Copyright: 2015 Jeffrey S. Gennari Versions: 1.0 November 2015 - initial version

      • connectToHouse

        public java.lang.Boolean connectToHouse(java.lang.String houseAddress)
        Connect to a house
        Parameters:
        houseAddress - the network address of the house. Once connected, this method starts a new thread to update house state
        Returns:

      • evaluateNewState

        public void evaluateNewState(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> state)
        Ensure the requested state is permitted. This method checks each state variable to ensure that the house remains in a consistent state.
        Parameters:
        state - The new state to evaluate
